docs.title: View Condition Types
docs.text:
To view a list of Condition Types, follow these steps:

  1. Click on the Condition Types option within Types.
  2. You will be redirected to the Condition Types Management page, where you can view the Condition Types.

docs.title: Add Condition Types
docs.text:
To add a new condition type, follow these steps:

  1. Click the Add button.
  2. Enter the Condition Type Name, Condition Type Description, and Data Type.
  3. Click the Submit button when you're done to save the condition type.

docs.title: Edit Condition Types
docs.text:
To edit a condition type, follow these steps:

  1. Click on the ConditionTypeId link associated with the condition type you want to edit. You will be redirected to the Edit Condition Type page.
  2. Modify the Condition Type Name, Condition Type Description, or Data Type as needed.
  3. Click the Submit button when you're done to update the condition type.

docs.title: Delete Condition Types
docs.text:
To delete a condition type, follow these steps:

  1. Click on the Name link associated with the condition type you want to delete. You will be redirected to the Edit Condition Type page.
  2. Click the Delete button. A warning pop-up will appear. 3. Click the Confirm button to proceed with the deletion.

docs.title: Updates
docs.text: The Updates Page provides information about the latest versions, build dates, and release notes for each release of the system.

docs.title: Users
docs.text: The User Page provides functionalities for managing user accounts within the system.

docs.title: Import Users
docs.text:
To import users using an importer, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, click the "Import" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Import Users page.
  3. Fill in the required information:
  4. Add Organization, User Role, and select a Users CSV file from your PC using the uploader.
  5. Click the "Save" button to import the users.

docs.title: Add Basic User
docs.text:
To add a basic user, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, click the "Basic User" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Register User page.
  3. Fill in the required information:
  4. Add First Name, Last Name, Email, Username, User Role, Organization, Phone number (optional), User Number.
  5. Click the "Submit" button to register the new user.

docs.title: Edit User
docs.text:
To edit an existing user, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, locate the user you want to edit.
  2. Click the clickable name link associated with the user.
  3. You will be redirected to the Edit User page.
  4. Make the desired changes:
  5. Change Username, First Name, Last Name, Organization, User Role, User Number.
  6. Optionally, add/change the Phone Number.
  7. Click the "Submit" button to save the changes.

docs.title: Delete User
docs.text:
To delete an existing user, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, locate the user you want to delete.
  2. Click the clickable name link associated with the user.
  3. You will be redirected to the Edit User page.
  4. Click the "Delete" button.
  5. A warning pop-up will appear.
  6. Confirm the deletion by clicking the "Confirm" button.

docs.title: Invite User
docs.text:
To add a user via invite, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, click the "Invite User" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Invite User page.
  3. Fill in the required information:
  4. Add Email Address, Organization, User Role.
  5. Click the "Submit" button to register the new user via invite.

docs.title: Add LDAP User
docs.text:
To add a user via an LDAP server, follow these steps:

  1. On the User Page, click the "LDAP User" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Add LDAP User page.
  3. To register an LDAP user, you have two options:
  4. Option 1: Enter Search Query parameters and click the "Search" button.
  5. Option 2: Fill in the required information - Email Address, Username, First Name, Last Name, Organization, User Role.
  6. Click the "Add User" button when done.

docs.title: Vehicle Routes
docs.text: The Vehicle Routes Page provides functionalities for managing vehicle routes in the system.

docs.title: Register Vehicle Route
docs.text:
To register a new vehicle route, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicle Routes Page, click the "Add" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Register Vehicle Route page.
  3. Fill in the required fields.
  4. Click the "Save" button to register the new vehicle route.

docs.title: Edit Vehicle Route
docs.text:
To edit an existing vehicle route, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicle Routes Page, locate the route you want to edit.
  2. Click on the route's name link to be redirected to the Edit Vehicle Route page.
  3. Modify the desired fields.
  4. Click the "Save" button to save the changes.

docs.title: Delete Vehicle Route
docs.text:
To delete an existing vehicle route, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicle Routes Page, locate the route you want to edit.
  2. Click on the route's name link to be redirected to the Edit Vehicle Route page.
  3. You will be redirected to the Edit Vehicle Route page.
  4. Click on the "Delete" button next to the Vehicle Route.
  5. A warning pop-up will appear.
  6. Confirm the deletion by clicking the "Confirm" button.

docs.title: Vehicles
docs.text: The Vehicles Page provides functionalities for managing vehicles in the system.

docs.title: Vehicle Map
docs.text:
The Vehicle Map feature allows users to view a map with a visual representation of vehicles.

To view the Vehicle Map, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicles Page, click the "Map" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Vehicle Map page, where a map view showing the vehicles will be displayed.

docs.title: Refresh Vehicles
docs.text:
The Refresh button allows users to reload the Vehicles Page.

To refresh the vehicles, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicles Page, click the "Refresh" button.
  2. The page will reload from scratch, which can help if the page appears to be stuck or unresponsive.

docs.title: Register New Vehicle
docs.text:
To register a new vehicle, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicles Page, click the "Add" button.
  2. You will be redirected to the Register Vehicle page.
  3. Fill in the required fields:
  4. Name: Enter the name of the vehicle.
  5. Description: Provide a description for the vehicle.
  6. Organization: Select the organization associated with the vehicle.
  7. Vehicle Type: Choose the type of vehicle.
  8. Vehicle Status: Set the status of the vehicle.
  9. Click the "Save" button to register the new vehicle.

docs.title: Edit Vehicle
docs.text:
To edit an existing vehicle's details, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicles Page, locate the vehicle you want to edit.
  2. Click on the vehicle's ID link to be redirected to the Vehicle Map page.
  3. On the Vehicle Map page, click the "Edit" button.
  4. You will be redirected to the Edit Vehicle page.
  5. Modify the desired fields:
  6. Name: Change the name of the vehicle.
  7. Description: Update the description of the vehicle.
  8. Organization: Change the organization associated with the vehicle.
  9. Vehicle Type: Modify the type of the vehicle.
  10. Vehicle Status: Update the status of the vehicle.
  11. Click the "Submit" button to save the changes.

docs.title: Delete Vehicle
docs.text:
To delete a vehicle, follow these steps:

  1. On the Vehicles Page, locate the vehicle you want to delete.
  2. Click on the vehicle's ID link to be redirected to the Vehicle Map page.
  3. On the Vehicle Map page, click the "Edit" button.
  4. You will be redirected to the Edit Vehicle page.
  5. Click the "Delete" button.
  6. A warning pop-up will appear.
  7. Confirm the deletion by clicking the "Confirm" button.
